overview:
Viktoriya Tigipko is Co-founder and Managing Director of venture capital fund TA Venture. Her primary activity is investing in innovative consumer Internet startups targeting the CIS countries and global markets.

Viktoriya is a Member of the Board of Directors of Bravoavia and General Partner of the business incubator for Internet start-ups Growth Up. She is also a Co-founder of the International Conference “Investor Day Central and Eastern Europe: Internet Technologies & Innovations”, which is held annually in Kiev, Ukaine. Apart from that, Viktoriya is the Founder and President of the Odessa International Film Festival. Viktoriya graduated from Kyiv National Economics University, majoring in international economic relations and law. She also studied financial management at Vienna University of Economics and completed Venture Capital for Executives Program at Berkeley.

milestones.description: Got into TOP 100 Most influental people in Ukraine.
